cardDescription: A simple rabbit, with no special abilities.
This is a common fighter, with no special abilities. He can be equipped with one equipment card.
This is a common caster card, with one spell that deals 2 damage to one target at a cost of 1. This caster can hold one equipment card.
This is a common Healer card, with the ability to heal 2 health to one target ally at a cost of 1. They cannont use quipment cards, but they can use one enhancement card.
This is an uncommon equipment card that can be equipped to a fighter or caster.
This is a common enhancement card that can be used by a healer to boost their healing.
This is an uncommon equipment card that can be equipped by a fighter. It gives the fighter +1 attack.
This is a rare creature card. It cannot be given equipment cards, but can have 2 creature enhancement cards.
This is an uncommon healer card. They can heal 3 health to one target ally at a cost of 1. They can use one enhancement card and one equipment card.
This is an uncommon caster card. They have one spell that deals 3 damage to one target at a cost of 1. They can use two equipment cards and one enhancement card.
This is a common fighter card in the 'Time is Right' set. He has no special abilities, and can use one equipment card.
This is a common enhancement card that can be placed on a piece of equipment to give the user +2 health.
This is a rare equipment card that reduces damage taken by the user by 3.
This is an uncommon fighter card. He has the ability to protect an ally from all damage, taking the damage reduced by 1. He can use two equipment cards and one enhancement card.
This is a common caster card. They have one spell that deals 2 fire damage to one target at a cost of 1. They can use one equipment card.
This is a common healing card. He can heal 2 health to one target at a cost of 1. He can use one enhancement card.
This is a common equipment card. It grants a fighter +1 attack or a caster +1 spell power.
This is a rare enhancement card. It grants a caster +3 spell power.
This is an uncommon creature card. It can use one creature enhancement card.
This is a common fighter. She can use one equipment card and one enhancement card.
This is an epic equipment card. It gives a caster +4 spell power and +2 health.

This is an uncommon caster card. She has two spells, on that deals 3 light damage to a target, and one that creates a shield of light that absorbs 1 damage. She can use two equipment cards and one enhancement card.

This is a common equipment card. It can be equipped by a fighter, giving them +2 attack. On every attack, flip two coins. If both are tails, the fighter takes 1 daamge, but still attacks. Else, attack as normal.

This is a common enhancement card. It can be used by anyone with an enhancement slot. At the beginning of the third turn after this card has been equipped, including the turn it was played on, the user gets +2 power to their main ability.
This is a common creature card.
